overview.projectType: Convert existing single detached home into a 7-plex
overview.basementExteriorWalls: Already in place and recently renovated

sections.title: Permits, Design, and Inspections
sections.description: Permit set, code coordination, and inspection planning for a Toronto multiplex conversion.

sections.title: Building Envelope and Insulation
sections.description: Continuous insulation + cavity insulation on ground floor; basement floor insulation assembly.

sections.title: Plumbing
sections.description: Full plumbing rework: DWV, water distribution, shutoffs, fixture rough-ins, firestopping.

sections.title: Heating and Cooling (HVAC)
sections.description: Heat pumps (primary), condensate strategy, electrical coordination; optional gas backup (if pursued).

sections.title: Ventilation (Kitchen + Bathroom + General)
sections.description: Bathroom exhaust and kitchen hood venting, terminations, make-up air (if required), sealing.

sections.title: Fire and Sound Assemblies
sections.description: Basement ceiling fire rating + soundproofing (resilient channel, damping, double Type X, sealing).

sections.title: Interior Finishes (Basement + Ground Floor)
sections.description: Tile, flooring, underlayment, waterproofing, trims, transitions.

sections.title: Structural / Carpentry / Access
sections.description: New basement stair, 3-step transition stair at garage conversion, framing/hardware.

sections.title: Garage Conversion (to Legal Living Room)
sections.description: Remove garage door, infill wall with window, insulation, drywall/finishes, exterior tie-in.

sections.title: Doors and Entrances
sections.description: Two exterior entrances for different units with weather sealing and hardware.

sections.title: Electrical / Low-Voltage and Tenant Services
sections.description: Intercom/doorbell for 7 endpoints + structured wiring to avoid future wall cuts; basic electrical coordination.

sections.title: Ceiling Work and Roof (Summer Scope)
sections.description: Ceiling work not covered elsewhere; roof replacement + added ventilation.

items.title: Prepare permit drawings + scope package for multiplex conversion
items.description: Assemble the permit set, including unit layouts, life-safety approach, mechanical/plumbing/electrical notes, and required details for a Toronto multiplex conversion.
items.note: Include fire separations/alarms/egress strategy early so downstream assemblies are not reworked.

items.title: Inspection plan (rough-in → close-up → final)
items.description: Define inspection checkpoints and prerequisites (photos, checklists, access).
items.note: Create a single list of inspection-ready evidence (photos of rough-in before closure, inventory for missing items).

items.title: Ground floor walls: continuous insulation layer
items.description: Install continuous insulation (interior/exterior as designed) and integrate air/vapour control layers.
items.note: Confirm thickness/spec and fastening strategy; ensure continuity at transitions and openings.

items.title: Ground floor walls: 2x4 cavity insulation + vapour/air sealing
items.description: Install cavity insulation (batts or spray foam per design/fire requirements) and complete vapour barrier and sealing where applicable.
items.note: Coordinate with electrical/plumbing rough-ins to avoid gaps and compression.

items.title: Basement floor insulation system
items.description: Install basement floor insulation assembly (rigid foam/subfloor panels/sleepers as designed) including vapour/underlayment strategy.
items.note: Confirm moisture management and floor height impacts with door/stair transitions.

materials.name: Rigid foam / subfloor panels / sleepers (per design)

items.title: Full plumbing rework (DWV + water distribution)
items.description: Redo plumbing: drain/waste/vent, water distribution, cleanouts, valves, manifolds, and unit shutoffs.
items.note: Plan for 7 kitchens total; bathrooms/laundry per final design. Coordinate penetrations + firestopping.

items.title: Heat pump system planning (multi-zone) + install allowances
items.description: Define heat pump approach (outdoor units + indoor heads/air handlers), routing, mounting, line sets, and service clearances.
items.note: Include condensate drainage plan and electrical coordination early.

materials.name: Electrical disconnects and whips (coordinate with electrical)

items.title: Optional: gas backup heating allowances (if pursued)
items.description: If you decide to include gas backup heating, plan furnace/coil integration and gas venting/piping after final HVAC design.
items.note: Keep as conditional scope until design is locked.

items.title: Bathroom exhaust venting (all bathrooms)
items.description: Install exhaust fans, insulated ducting, terminations, dampers, and sealing for all bathrooms per layout.
items.note: Coordinate routes early to avoid conflicts with framing and rated assemblies.

items.title: Kitchen hood venting (all kitchens)
items.description: Provide ducted kitchen hood venting sized per hood specs with proper terminations and dampers; plan make-up air if required.
items.note: Prefer smooth metal duct where required; confirm termination locations with roof scope.

materials.name: Kitchen hood ducting sized per hood specs

items.title: Air sealing around penetrations (rated + non-rated)
items.description: Seal penetrations with fire-rated products where needed and standard sealing elsewhere; coordinate with fire/sound assemblies.
items.note: Track every penetration through rated assemblies to avoid missed firestopping.

items.title: Basement ceiling: resilient channel + damping + double 5/8 Type X
items.description: Sound isolation and fire-rated ceiling assembly including resilient channels, damping layer, double Type X drywall, sealing, and penetration treatment.
items.note: Confirm exact assembly requirements with the permit set and inspection requirements.

materials.name: Drywall screws (correct length for layers + channels)
Putty pads for electrical boxes (if used)

items.title: Tile package (wet areas and as designed)
items.description: Tile materials and install consumables for bathrooms/kitchens/backsplashes as designed.
items.note: Confirm quantities from final drawings and allow waste factor.

items.title: Flooring package (basement + ground floor as designed)
items.description: Non-tile flooring materials plus underlayment, transitions, trims, and moisture layers where required.
items.note: Coordinate floor build-up thickness with doors, stairs, and thresholds.

items.title: New basement stair (full stair down)
items.description: Build/install basement stair including framing and safety elements.
items.note: Confirm opening size, headroom, and guard/handrail requirements in drawings.

items.title: 3-step stair between converted garage and main living room
items.description: Build the short transition stair and finish to match interior flooring/trim.
items.note: Confirm whether railing/guard is triggered based on height and configuration.

items.title: Remove garage door and build infill wall with window
items.description: Convert garage opening into framed wall assembly with window, insulation, interior finishes, and exterior tie-in.
items.note: Confirm wall assembly details (air/vapour control + insulation continuity).

items.title: Install two exterior entrance doors for different units
items.description: Provide exterior door assemblies, flashing, weather sealing, and hardware.
items.note: Decide keyed vs smart lock strategy; ensure unit addressing/labels align with intercom.

items.title: Tenant entry / delivery intercom (7 endpoints)
items.description: Plan and rough-in multi-tenant intercom/doorbell system so deliveries can reach each unit.
items.note: Prefer conduit and a central structured panel for serviceability.

materials.name: Tenant indoor stations or app-based endpoints

items.title: Internet provisioning (structured wiring, no future wall cuts)
items.description: Provide conduit pathways and structured cabling from telecom entry to comms closet and into suites.
items.note: Run conduit with pull strings; label everything; plan ONT/modem location and power.

materials.name: Patch panels, keystone jacks, wall plates

items.title: Electrical capacity and rough-in coordination
items.description: Confirm panel capacity, dedicated circuits for HVAC/major loads, and rough-in schedule alignment with framing and inspections.
items.note: Keep this high-level here; detailed electrical takeoff can be a later pass.

items.title: Ceiling work not covered elsewhere
items.description: Complete ceiling framing/strapping and drywall where required outside the basement ceiling assembly scope.
items.note: Coordinate lighting, ducting, and access panels before closure.

items.title: Roof replacement and add roof ventilation (summer scope)
items.description: Replace roof and add ventilation components as designed (ridge/soffit/baffles, etc.).
items.note: Coordinate roof penetrations for bathroom/kitchen vents and any HVAC line routing.

materials.name: Ventilation components (ridge vent / soffit vents / baffles)

notes.title: Documentation habit
notes.content: Photograph all rough-in work (plumbing, electrical, HVAC) before wall/ceiling closure. Store by section + date.

notes.title: Blocked item review
notes.content: Review blocked items weekly with an owner and target unblock date; avoid hidden dependencies.

notes.title: Procurement batching
notes.content: Batch procurement runs and supplier calls weekly to reduce context switching; keep a running takeoff list by section.

notes.title: Inspection prep
notes.content: Maintain an inspection checklist and ensure key materials (firestopping, access panels, labels) are ready before booking.
